revised_title: The Impact of Groundwater Variations on Malaria Incidence in Chotta Nagpur, Bengal
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between fluctuations in groundwater levels and the occurrence of malarial fevers in Chotta Nagpur, Bengal. The authors find a correlation between high groundwater levels and increased malarial fever cases, suggesting that proper drainage and water management could help reduce the incidence of the disease.
